strapiPost.title: A New Sushi Joint Just Rolled Into Downtown Rogers
strapiPost.content:
Take a trip to Downtown Rogers to check out the incredible seafood and sushi at Blu DTR which opened this last weekend at 214 W. Elm St. 

  • Big sis: Blu DTR is sourced by its sister restaurant Blu Fresh Fish Market in Bentonville which flies fresh fish in daily from the coast and the Gulf for its restaurant, sushi bar, and fish market. 
  • Fast fame: After opening last weekend, Blu DTR is already racking up great reviews from the community for itâ€™s fantastic sushi, seafood, cocktails, and friendly service. 

Find more information HERE.
